website_summaries.verdict: Since many Jurassic World LEGO sets can be fairly pricy, this fun little playset is an inexpensive way to get your hands on some high-flying dinosaur action.
pros: Build a helicopter, volcanic eruption, and dinosaur-hunting gear
Includes 2 Jurassic World employees and pteranodon
cons: An easier set to assemble for veteran builders

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I HATE putting legos together lol so when I hit this for my 6 year old , it was a a win win situation!! He loved helping me put it together and the best thing is it didn’t take a hour to do it ‘n

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids under 8
customer_reviews.text: Way too many small parts. Most were lost before the end of the week. It’s says 4+ but wouldn’t recommend for any child under 6.. maybe even 8.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME

product_meta.title: LEGO Juniors/4+ Jurassic World Pteranodon Escape 10756 Building Kit (84 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Introduce your child to the excitement of exploring in a LEGO Juniors/4+ adventure with this 10756 Pteranodon Escape starter set, featuring an Easy to Build helicopter model with a Starter Brick chassis and spinning rotor, small volcano with buildable lava balls and a buildable Pteranodon with movable wings and beak. This cool dinosaur toy also includes a simple guide to build and play to help build confidence in children. Includes 2 minifigures and a Pteranodon figure.
feature_bullets: Build an awesome Pteranodon figure with movable wings, a small volcano with lava and buildable lava balls, plus a helicopter model with spinning rotor and a Starter Brick chassis!
Includes 3 figures: a Pteranodon, a tracker and a pilot
Helicopter measures over 3-inch (8cm) high, 5-inch (13cm) long and 3-inch (10cm) wide Pteranodon with wings extended measures over 1-inch (3cm) high, 3-inch (10cm) long and 7-inch (20cm) wide
84 pieces – Cool Jurassic World flying dinosaur starter set toy for boys and girls between the ages of 4 and 7
LEGO Juniors/4+ building toys are Easy to Build and compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars378 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
